parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> LeaderBoards

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> returns state of the board with given name. 0: Busy (async. operation in progress); 1: Async. operation ended with success; 2: Async. operation ended with error; 3: Invalid board (bad board name, not initialized etc.).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''leaderboardState''' boardname

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> boardname: [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[leaderboardState]] ["TT01", 1234, [5,6,7,8]]</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[leaderboardsRequestUploadScoreKeepBest]] leaderboardsRequestUploadScore
</value></part></template>
